T02D2883:225b-1: badzra batir'a dza tund'e s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D2883:225b-3: nam mkha'i lding gi rgyal po rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2883:225b-4: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2883:225b-5: re zhig dang por dben pa'i gnas su //
T02D2883:225b-6: rig pa 'dzin pa des khrus bgyis te gtsang mar bgyis la /
T02D2883:225b-8: dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas shing /
T02D2883:225b-9: gtsang spra spyod pa dang bcas pas mandala ba'i rnam lngas byugs la spos kyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te /
T02D2883:225b-10: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i gzugs sam /
T02D2883:225b-11: mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su bzhag ste /
T02D2883:225b-12: spos chab kyis bkru bar bya'o //
T02D2883:225b-13: me tog dang bdug pa la sogs te /
T02D2883:225b-14: mchod rdzas rnams bshams la stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D2883:225b-15: dang por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed la de'i
T02D2883:225b-16: rang bzhin aa las zla ba'i steng du h'um yongs
T02D2883:225b-18: de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang lhag pa'i lha
T02D2883:225b-19: dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun
T02D2883:225b-20: du bkug ste / phyag btsal ba dang /
T02D2883:225b-22: rjes su yi rang zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T02D2883:225b-23: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D2883:225b-24: de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos te gshegs su gso //
T02D2883:225b-25: tshangs ba'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2883:225b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mtshan dang dpe byang ldan par bskyed la /
T02D2883:225b-28: btang snyoms chen po'i ngag gis sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D2883:225b-29: na mo bha ga ba te /
T02D2883:225b-34: bhu dze ta th'a bhu dze /
T02D2883:225b-36: sa manta aa ka bhu dza /
T02D2883:225b-38: sa ma ya p'a l'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2883:225b-39: klu mi bgrungs pa dam tshig mi 'tshal ba rnams
T02D2883:225b-40: slar bzlog cing bskrad pa'i phyir lan bdun brjod do
T02D2883:225b-41: // sv'a bh'a ba bi shuddh'a:sarba dharmma:sva bh'a ba bi
T02D2883:225b-42: shuddhonyaha zhes brjod pas de nyid kyi ngang las badzra
T02D2883:225b-43: ba ti ga ru da zhes rnam pa dang bcas
T02D2883:225b-44: te h'um ngo bor gnas pa las de nyid yongs
T02D2883:225b-46: rin po che 'bar ba h'um gis mtshan pa /
T02D2883:226a-0: @226a * // 'od zer gyi phreng ba rnam par 'khrugs par gyur /
T02D2883:226a-1: de dag yongs su gyur pa las ra dzi sri
T02D2883:226a-2: dza h'um zhes pas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po
T02D2883:226a-4: rdo rje'i mchu can bdag nyid chen po'i lus 'bar ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin /
T02D2883:226a-5: khro bo 'jigs su rung ba rtsal can /
T02D2883:226a-6: rin po che tha dad ba sna tshogs dang /
T02D2883:226a-9: gser gyis spras pa'i rgyan mgo la thogs pa /
T02D2883:226a-11: dregs pa'i gzugs 'gying bas blta ba /
T02D2883:226a-12: klu chen po brgyad gdan du bcas pa /
T02D2883:226a-13: klu mgo dgu pa rgyan du byas pa /
T02D2883:226a-14: klu mgo gsum pa g-yas na thogs pa /
T02D2883:226a-15: nor bu rin po che'i dbyig pa g-yon na thogs pa /
T02D2883:226a-16: lus thams cad rdo rje 'bar ba gser gyi rang
T02D2883:226a-17: bzhin gshog pa'i 'dab ma brkyang pas klu rigs dbang
T02D2883:226a-18: du sdud pa / g-yog 'khor nam mkha' lding gi tshogs kyis bskor ba cig tu bsam par bya'o //
T02D2883:226a-19: de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i phyag rgya bcas te /
T02D2883:226a-20: aom su pra tishtha badzra dun ti mi li mi li sv'a h'a /
T02D2883:226a-21: de nas brtan par byas te lus bsrung bar bya'o /
T02D2883:226a-22: de dang 'dra ba'i nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs la /
T02D2883:226a-23: yang dag par mchod cing bstod la de nyid kyi rten la bstim par bya'o //
T02D2883:226a-24: de nas ji ltar skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du spro ba dang /
T02D2883:226a-26: de nyid gsal bar ma gyur na skyon spangs pa'i bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2883:226a-27: aom badzra ba ti ga rud be ge ta h'um
T02D2883:226a-28: h'um dza dza r'a sri dza h'um phat ces nyin
T02D2883:226a-29: gcig bzhin sngags stong ngam khri brjod do //
T02D2883:226a-30: nam lus kyis mi thub par skyo bar 'gyur ba'i tshe kha zas dkar po bza' bar bya ste /
T02D2883:226a-31: yang khrus byas la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2883:226a-32: gu gul gyi dud pas bdug go //
T02D2883:226a-38: gtor ma'i rdzas ci 'byor pas mchod cing /
T02D2883:226a-39: yang dag par bstod nas nyan la /
T02D2883:226a-40: dge ba dang mi dge ba ston par 'gyur zhing las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur la /
T02D2883:226a-41: mchog dang thun mong thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro //
T02D2883:226a-42: ci bsgo ba des byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2883:226a-43: grub nas kyang rtag tu mchod par bya'o //
T02D2883:226b-0: nam mkha' lding gi @226b rgyal po sngon du bsnyen
